mapper.select: SELECT id , name , genre_id , play_time , casts , description , restrict_age FROM cinema_tbl WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ct.id , ct.name , ct.genre_id , gt.name AS genre_name , ct.play_time , ct.casts , ct.description , ct.restrict_age FROM cinema_tbl AS ct INNER JOIN genre_tbl AS gt ON ct.genre_id = gt.id ORDER BY ct.id DESC
